content: this hat is designed to reach the base of the earlobe instructions are included to alter the hat height finished project child hat 1 6 oz 46 g and 146 yds 133 m my bright blue alpine hat is available in 10-sizes my bright blue alpine hat is available in sizes newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-24 months small child 3-5 years child 6-10 years teen adult medium and adult large the hat is crocheted from the top-down in rounds in one piece get the scarf that uses the same yarn here direct link to pattern > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until october 24 > 2022 at 11 59 pm et for cal > participants simply add the pattern > to your cart before 11 59 pm est on > october 24th and it will show as > $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on october 23 2022 at 7 00 pm est this pattern is available for free on my blog which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confi… facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2022 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
